snippet.title: Felon-e: Revolutionary AI Conversation in Games
snippet.description:
Felon-E is an investigation game where players must infiltrate a secret robot sect, interact vocally with NPCs to collect clues, and gain the trust of the robotic priest Colbert Metalcreux to solve the mystery.

🔓 Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2504610/FelonE/
✅ Add it to your Wishlist now!
📅 Play Test available starting July 2nd.

#Smartnpc #ai #gaming #videogames #felon-e
